Package org.tedros.fx.presenter.model

Class TModelView<M extends org.tedros.server.model.ITModel>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tedros.fx.presenter.model.TModelView<M>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.tedros.core.model.ITModelView<M>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TEntityModelView, TImportModelView
    public abstract class TModelView<M extends org.tedros.server.model.ITModel>
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.tedros.core.model.ITModelView<M>

    This engine can bind all javafx property between a TModelView and a ITModel, listeners are build to listen changes in the properties and set the new values in the ITModel.

    Sample Usage

     
 // The model
 public class ExampleModel implements ITModel {
 
    private Long id;
    ...
    private String name;
    private BigDecimal value;
    private Date date;
    ...         
   // getters and setters
 }
 
 // The TModelView
 public class ExampleModelView extends TModelView<ExampleModel>{
  
    private SimpleLongProperty id;
    ...
    private SimpleStringProperty name;
    private SimpleObjectProperty<BigDecimal> value;
    private SimpleObjectProperty<Date> date;
    
    public ExampleModelView(ExampleModel model) {
      super(model);
    }
    ...
    // getters and setters
  }
    Author:
    Davis Gordon

      • reflectionHashCode

        public int reflectionHashCode​(java.lang.String... excludeFields)
         To be called by hashCode methods. 
 The hashCode are built over the ITModel object instead this TModelView object
 the reason is because we need to know when the model is changed and we do this
 observing the hashcode value. 
 
 
        Example:
        public class ExampleModelView extends TModelView<ExampleModel>{
                ...
                @Override
                public int hashCode() {
                        return reflectionHashCode("someFieldToBeExcluded");
                }
        }
        Parameters:
        excludeFields -
